data.name: Sniper Elite 3 - Sniper Rifles Pack
data.detailed_description:
Own the landscape and keep your foes at a distance with three of the greatest sniper rifles ever made. All three rifles can be used in any multiplayer, singleplayer or co-operative game mode in Sniper Elite 3.

This DLC pack includes:

  • Karabiner 98K rifle: one of the last rifles produced by German arms giant, Mauser, and highly sought after by both Axis and Allied forces for its all round high performance.
  • M1917 Enfield rifle: known as the “American Enfield” this crucial sharpshooter was shipped across Europe and North Africa to assist Allied troops, boasting a higher zoom and lower recoil than other rifles.
  • Springfield rifle (tuned): this variation of the American classic has been tuned to increase both its damage and muzzle velocity, making it one the most powerful rifles available.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® Vista (Service Pack 2) or Windows® 7 (Service Pack 1) or Windows® 8 or Windows 8.1. Windows® XP is NOT supported.
  • Processor: Dual-core CPU with SSE3 (Intel® Pentium® D 3GHz / AMD Athlon™ 64 X2 4200) or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Microsoft® DirectX® 10.0 compatible graphics card with 256 MB of memory (NVIDIA® GeForce® 8800 series / ATI Radeon™ HD 3870) or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 18 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Microsoft® DirectX® 10.0 compatible sound card or better
  • Additional Notes: Windows® XP is NOT supported. Ensure graphics and audio drivers are up to date.
